name: SpriteShift
description:
SpriteShift

You play as Zack Hume, a humble janitor with the ability to suck up and spit out objects. Solve physics puzzles throughout the hillside so you can meet your girlfriend at the festival.

Controls

Move - WASD
Jump - Space
Suck up/spit out - Left Click
Dialogue Box - E

This game was created in one week using the Kenney 1-Bit Pack (https://www.kenney.nl/assets/bit-pack) as a part of "Miz Jam 1"
